requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: fx 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: fx 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
